title: I lost all of my champions
body: I have returned from a year or two of not playing, finding myself championless. If you check my match history It's full of Rengar, however I no longer own Rengar. Is there any way to fix this rather than having to repurchase all of my other champions.

replies.body:
I've got your account pulled up and it doesn't look like this one has ever had Rengar owned. I did notice all the games you've played with him, and it seems like you only play Rengar in spurts where he's all you play for certain time periods....hmmm...

After a little more digging, it looks like all the times where you played Rengar was during [**weekly champ rotations**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/free-rotation/new-free-champion-rotation-rengar-sona-yasuo-and-more) when he was free to play. This account hasn't ever bought Rengar or had him gifted to it, but if you're talking about a different account I can definitely look into that one as well!
luuuuuuuuuuuul, nice try at a free champ I guess
